column4: Hippu, my new laptop came today.  First thing I did was install ubuntu, and this was my first ubuntu experience.
welcome, any questions?
just one (for now)
pastebin the output of lspci please
lspci in Terminal
that's hard, because it's not on the network
well, can you just see it sez for Network Controller/
sure.  It says network controller: Intel Corporation Unknown device 4229 (rev 61)
gimme a momento
you a Dell?
do you have your Windows drivers?
hmmm, not sure.  The install overwrote windows, and I'm not sure if they included a cd or not.
(checking...)
nope.  No cds or dvds in the box at all.
whats your Sony Vaio model? i will find you your driver
thanks!  it's a vgn-cr190
PM me so I can give you attention
PM me please
what does that mean?
send me a private message
so I can give you some attention
I will once I figure out how to do it :)
